titles.title: My God, How Wonderful Thou Art

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My God, how wonderful Thou art, Thy majesty how bright, How beautiful Thy mercy seat, In depths of burning light!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: How dread are Thy eternal years, O everlasting Lord, By prostrate spirits day and night Incessantly adored!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: How wonderful, how beautiful, The sight of Thee must be, Thine endless wisdom, boundless pow’r, And glorious purity!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O how I fear Thee, Living God, With deepest, tend’rest fears, And worship Thee with trembling hope, And penitential tears.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Yet I may love Thee too, O Lord, Almighty as Thou art; For Thou hast stooped to ask of me The love of my poor heart.
